title: Interpretation of a dream about rotten fruit

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about rotten fruit in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about rotten fruit in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about rotten fruit in a dream can be a sign of... Trouble, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees rotten fruit, this may mean that he will be exposed to problems, and God knows best. If a married woman sees rotten fruit in a dream, it may be a sign that she will be exposed to loss, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees rotten fruit in a dream, this may express that she will be exposed to loss. God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about fruits falling from the sky in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about fruits falling from the sky in a dream can indicate goodness and living, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If the dreamer sees fruit falling from the sky, it may be good news, and God knows all that is unseen. If a married woman sees fruit falling from The sky in a dream may be a sign of goodness and sustenance, God willing. When a single girl sees a fruit falling from the sky in a dream, it may be a sign of goodness and happiness, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about eating fruit in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about eating saffron cake in a dream. Seeing saffron cake can indicate food, and God knows the unseen. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a ruler in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a ruler in a dream by Ibn Sirin. There has been a lot of research in recent hours and days to interpret dreams, and it is known that each dream has its own meaning. The interpretation of a dream varies from one person to another according to the mood and psychological state of the dreamer, and among these dreams that dreamers are looking for is the pursuit of an interpretation of a dream about seeing a ruler in Ibn Sirin. The dream that we will learn about during our conversation. Interpretation of seeing a ruler in a dream Seeing a ruler in a dream has many concepts that scholars have worked hard to explain and identify their concepts, and the most important of them can be summarized in the following points: Seeing a ruler in a dream shows many positive changes that will happen to him in the future. Or if he sees himself talking to the governor with confidence in a dream, this indicates the confidence of the opinion in himself, and God knows best. Imam Ibn Sirin said: “Seeing a ruler in a dream in general indicates the arrival of kindness and food.” Also, dreaming of a leader visiting the mantis’ house means that you will hear good news soon. Finally, when the sleeper sees the governor in his dream, this means that he will achieve all his dreams and hopes. Perhaps this dream also shows that the dreamer will find a job that has prestige. Seeing the Prime Minister in a dream In addition to the interpretation of the dream of seeing the ruler in a dream by Ibn Sirin, there are many concepts for seeing the Prime Minister in a dream and referring to the second concepts: Seeing the Prime Minister in a dream suggests a feeling of stability and psychological security. Seeing the Prime Minister in a dream means that the dreamer has many loyal friends. If the sleeper sleeps that he has become Prime Minister, this means that he will achieve many achievements. This vision shows that the life of its owner will change for the better in the coming period. Interpretation of seeing an advisor in a single woman’s dream If a single girl sees an advisor in her sleep, this means that she will get married soon, and if she sees him angry, this indicates that her behavior and behavior are bad, and Al-Nabulsi showed that seeing the advisor while visiting his home is single. The girl symbolizes relief from envy, but if the girl sees herself becoming a counselor in her dream, which means that she will understand a high position, and talking to him means that she will fulfill her desires. Seeing the minister in a married man's dream The married man saw that he was in a dispute and quarrel with the minister and then gave him his hands, this means that he will see the minister soon to end his marital problems, and when the man sees the minister in his dream, this indicates many joys, joys and happy situations, so when he sees the minister entering his dream house, this indicates that he is listening to good news, but if he eats with the minister, this means that the dreamer will reach a prestigious position. This was a group of interpretations of the dream of seeing the ruler in a dream by Ibn Sirin and other scholars and interpreters, in addition to seeing leadership figures and legal figures, but they remain just human judgments that may be correct or wrong. Caution must be paid.

title: Interpretation of a dream about eating pasta with béchamel in detail

preview.html: The Encyclopedia of Interpretation presents a dream about eating pasta with béchamel in a dream, which is one of the most popular and loved foods in the Arab world, and when eaten in reality, it gives a feeling of happiness and pleasure. Since béchamel pasta has great importance in human life, what is it like when you see it in a dream? It carries the same meaning, that is, it appears good or bad to the fortuneteller, and this we will explain the following lines according to what was narrated by dream interpretation scholars, so follow us. Interpretation of dreams about eating pasta with bechamel. The scholar Ibn Sirin says the following interpretations about seeing pasta with bechamel in a dream, which we present below: This vision indicates In an unmarried woman’s dream, it indicates that she will soon marry a well-off man. Eating pasta with bechamel until you are full in your dream symbolizes the goodness and nourishment that you will get from a job in which success is achieved. When unmarried people prepare pasta with bechamel, this indicates preparation for a holiday. Happy. Interpretation of pasta with béchamel in a dream for a married woman. Below are the different interpretations of seeing pasta with béchamel in a married woman’s dream: A married woman cooking pasta in a dream indicates her desire to lead her home and family with wisdom and success. Eating pasta with béchamel for a married woman in a dream symbolizes the fulfillment of desires. And responding to prayers. The husband eats pasta cooked by his wife’s hand for family stability and marital happiness between them. Interpretation of a dream about pasta with béchamel for a pregnant woman: A pregnant woman who eats pasta with béchamel in a dream indicates ease of childbirth and safety for her and her fetus. Eating raw pasta in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the problems she will go through during Pregnancy. A pregnant woman preparing pasta symbolizes the birth of an honest offspring that has a high status in religious and scientific aspects. Interpretation of seeing eating pasta brown in a dream: Eating raw pasta in a dream indicates that the dreamer has a hasty nature in making decisions without careful thought or sound reasoning. This symbolizes The vision indicates that the dreamer is trying to achieve success at work so that he can earn money. Interpretation of a dream about long pasta: Eating long pasta in a dream symbolizes that God Almighty will grant the dreamer a long life. Eating long pasta in a dream means suffering and trouble, and God Almighty knows best. Seeing long pasta indicates Red sauce indicates anxiety and sadness, while white pasta indicates overcoming trials at God’s command. These were different interpretations of seeing pasta with béchamel in a dream for single, married and pregnant women. Her fault and to interpret another dream, you can enter the instant dream interpretation application.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a rainbow in a dream and its meanings

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a rainbow in a dream. It is one of those visions that are strange to many people, but it is considered one of the visions worthy of praise, which mostly and generally bode well, as it includes many interpretations, meanings, and explanations that are considered promising. It differs from one person to another based on his social and psychological situation, and many dream interpreters have explained these meanings, and here in the article we present to you the interpretation of a dream about a rainbow in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a rainbow in a dream It is worth noting that seeing a rainbow in a dream is considered one of the praiseworthy visions that give Hope, optimism, and joy for the soul, as it contains many different interpretations, meanings, and explanations. Accordingly, we will explain to you in the following lines its interpretation of a dream about a rainbow. A rainbow in a dream, which is: If a married man sees this vision, this is a sign of fertility. Because it indicates that God Almighty will grant him Good offspring. Also, for a single person, this vision is a sign of marriage. Especially if this person is looking for a husband. In addition, seeing a rainbow in a dream is for a single girl. It is a sign that this girl will achieve all her desires and dreams and that God Almighty will provide her with a good husband. He will also be the source of her happiness and joy and will compensate her for her past days, and all those hardships that she may have gone through in her life. This vision is also evidence of success and ambition for an unmarried girl. If this bow is filled with many colors, it is a sign On the date of her next wedding and indicates that she will achieve all her goals. See also: Interpretation of dreams of seeing jahamah in a dream for single and married women, pregnant women and men. Interpretation of seeing a rainbow for a married woman, especially since this vision differs in the meanings and interpretations it contains from one person to another, and the difference is based on his social status, and many One of the dream interpreters who explained all the meanings and indicators contained in these dreams, and based on this, we present to you the interpretation of a dream about a rainbow for a married woman, which is: If a married woman sees a rainbow in a dream. This dream is evidence that he will achieve all the goals that he seeks and wants to achieve. Whether these goals are at the family level or the practical level. In addition, this vision is a sign of removing sadness and tension from this woman’s life. It will also bring psychological comfort and stability to family life. Perhaps among those interpretations included in this vision is that he will obtain great nourishment from God. See also: Interpretation of seeing our former home in a dream for single, pregnant and married women. Interpretation of a rainbow in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin is also considered one of the most famous scholars of dream interpretation, who contributed to clarifying these meanings and interpretations of this vision, as it is one of the visions worthy of praise and promising. According to the scholar Ibn Sirin, this vision is one of the good visions, as it indicates goodness and positivity in the life of the visionary. In addition, it is evidence of achieving the goals that the dreamer seeks in life.

title: Interpretation of a dream about the king visiting the house in a dream

preview.html: Seeing the king visiting his house in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the king’s visit in the dreamer’s dream. This is evidence of the abundance of sustenance and many good things that the dreamer will obtain. The dream visiting the king of the house is evidence of the end of injustice carried by the dreamer. It is evidence of ending poverty and hunger and earning a lot of money. But if A pregnant woman saw in her dream a visit to the king, this indicates that she will give birth to a son and will have a great future in the future. If the woman is unmarried and sees the king visiting her in a dream. This is evidence that her wishes, all her dreams, and all her problems will soon come true. Interpretation of a dream about visiting the king’s palace in A dream: When a person dreams that he visited the king’s palace and shook hands with the king in a dream. This indicates his nourishment and good skin, and God will give him a lot. But when the king shakes hands with his family in a dream, this is strong evidence that he will find a new, very good job for him and his family. When you shake hands with the king, kiss him, and embrace him, This is evidence of the fulfillment of the dreamer’s desires and an indication that all goals will be achieved soon. However, if the girl is single and saw in her dream that she visited the king’s palace and saw the prince in a dream. This is evidence that she has acquired a future son-in-law who has a good personality and good omens for happiness. If she is married, this indicates On the marriage of one of her relatives, who is dear to her heart. And obtaining marital happiness very soon. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the king and sitting with him by Ibn Sirin. The king’s visit to the house and sitting, with the presence of the dreamer in the dream, is strong evidence that the dreamer will obtain an excellent position in the near future, God willing. Sitting with The king and sitting with him in a dream is a sign that the dreamer is gaining powerful powers and that goodness comes to him from where he does not expect it. But if someone sits with a foreign king, he visits him in his home during his sleep. This suggests an injustice befalling him and suggests alienation and being away from his homeland and family. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a king In a dream for a married woman: Visiting the King in a dream: A married woman, even though she is suffering from problems in her life. This vision is evidence of getting rid of problems in her real life. But if she is really working, this is evidence of her promotion at work and her acquisition of a distinguished position at work, and many good things await her. It could be that The interpretation of a dream about the king visiting the house in a married woman’s dream is a sign of the abundant wealth and goodness that she will soon obtain and her husband’s promotion in his work. But if the woman did not give birth after the king’s visit in her sleep. Evidence of the good news of childbirth, and soon she will be pregnant, and God will bless her with a child. Interpretation of the vision King Abdullah in a dream When you see King Abdullah’s people in the dream, this is evidence of justice and giving full rights to everyone who has the right and the goodness that awaits the dreamer in reality. But if he sees that King Abdullah is performing the duties of his kingdom over the years. This is strong evidence of his long life. The vision and he will perform administrative duties at home and at work. Seeing him in clean, beautiful and well-kept clothes shows the great strength and wisdom of the dreamer in reality. I dreamed that the king visited me at home.

title: I dreamed that I was taking a shower in my company in a dream

I dreamed that I was bathing my partner in A dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing bathing can be a sign of repentance, and God knows the unseen. When you see bathing, it can be a sign of purification and repentance, and God has all knowledge. If a married woman sees bathing in a dream, it may express her cleansing of sins and transgressions. And God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my mother-in-law expelling me from the house in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my mother-in-law expelling me from the house in a dream may express injustice to the dreamer, and God knows the unseen. Where a vision of a married woman can overtake her mother-in-law and expel her, this could lead to injustice that will go away, and God knows the unseen. If The dreamer saw his mother-in-law expelling him from the house in a dream, then this may be a sign of injustice, and God knows the unseen. Whereas if the dreamer sees someone expelling him from the house in a dream, it may be a sign of good luck. Interpretation of a dream about my mother-in-law cooking in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my mother-in-law cooking in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing cancer in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing cancer in a dream: Cancer is a malignant disease. We ask him to turn to God and we appeal to everyone who suffers for a speedy and speedy recovery. Because cancer is a malignant disease in reality, seeing it in a dream is one of the things that gives it increases pressure and tension in the spirit of insight, and therefore we study it in this the article. Seeing cancer in the dream of a man, a girl, or a married woman, based on what was stated in the interpretations of major interpretation scholars such as Imam Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and others.Interpretation of seeing cancer for the dead by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a dead person with cancer if the person sees that he has died or that one of his relatives or a distant relative or A distant relative, for example, was afflicted with a chronic illness or a serious illness such as cancer in the dream. The dead person may have debts that he did not pay before his death, or he died due to a great sin, and it varies according to the severity and seriousness of the illness, so he must ask the dead person whether he has debts or not. no. If he is in debt, he must pay it because the dead person is imprisoned from entering Paradise until his debt is paid. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person having cancer: If he left behind in his life before his death, he must pay zakat. Interpretation of a dream about cancer for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees that she has cancer in a dream, this is evidence of She will not suffer from a serious illness throughout her life, because it indicates that she will be healthy. Seeing a girl with cancer in a dream is evidence that she is suffering from a psychological crisis and feelings of turmoil, and this dream does not reflect that this terrible disease will affect her one day. Seeing a girl who is not Married to someone who has cancer in a dream is a symbol that someone is planning conspiracies against her and setting many traps for her to harm her. If a girl sees that she has lung cancer in a dream, you have evidence that she should exercise because of its positive effect on a person’s health and mood, and it has made him lively. Interpretation of a dream about cancer for a married woman. If a married woman sees in a dream a person with cancer, this is evidence that there is a person in her life who pretends to be against what is hidden and is known for his hypocrisy. Seeing a married woman with cancer in a dream is evidence that she is causing problems for her family, children, and husband because of her bad reputation and characteristics. The bad that characterizes her, such as being brilliant, a liar, and attacking people around her. If a married woman sees that one of her children has cancer in a dream, this is evidence that someone is actually conspiring with her and deceiving her. Interpretation of a dream about cancer for a pregnant woman If Mrs. Hope sees that she has cancer, this is evidence However, she was anxious and worried about the approaching date of her birth, and this does not mean that this cursed disease will affect her or her fetus. Interpretation of seeing cancer in a dream for a man: If one sees that he has cancer in a dream, this is evidence that he has tremendous physical strength, as well as health and well-being. And that the dream did not indicate any illness, poverty, or death, God forbid, or of any of his family members. If a man sees that his wife has uterine cancer in a dream, this is evidence that this woman will commit the immorality that she is free from.

title: Interpretation of a dream about my stomach chasing me

preview.html: Many women have strange visions. In this article, I am haunted by the interpretation of a gecko dream. The stomach is known as one of the geckos and is called leprosy. It has many different colors and names. Sometimes called a gecko or a gecko. There are many colors that characterize geckos, such as grey, red, and brown. And sometimes it is green, according to many commentators, who believe that seeing it in a dream means that the dreamer is jealous, and the house in which he lives is also very envious of him, and these visions differ from one person to another depending on the social and psychological state and what the dreamer is experiencing in life, so we will talk to you. Today about the interpretation of a dream about leprosy for married and divorced women and even girls. Interpretation of a dream about my stomach chasing me. The great scholar Sheikh Ibn Sirin expresses in his book “Maktab Al-Kalam fi Interpretation of Dreams” that seeing lepers in general in a dream is evidence of the misguidance of people in this life who do evil and forbid good. As for According to Sheikh Al-Nabulsi, if the dreamer sees himself eating the meat of a leper in his dream, this is a sign to stop speaking badly to people on purpose. But if the dreamer sees a leper eating his meat, this is a warning to him that there are those who speak obscene words about him in his absence and mistreat him. If the dreamer He dreams that his stomach is chasing him and at that time he feels fear, this is an indication that he is doing some useless actions and he must stop them because they are shameful and it can be interpreted that there are some enemies who want this. Take him, conspire against him, and prepare to deceive him, and he will be warned. Among the promising visions in this context is that the dreamer kills lepers in his dream. Among the unpleasant visions is that the leprosy spits money, as it is an indication that the dreamer will lose his life and money and may be affected by poverty. Interpretation of a married woman’s dream These visions are dreams that make the woman feel afraid Intense and dread, and in the following lines we will explain the meaning of seeing a stomach for a married woman, which is as follows: In the event that a married dreamer sees a stomach, this indicates that she is suffering from problems in her marital life, and seeing leprosy indicates the occurrence of some financial crises for her. But if a woman sees For a married woman, she will kill the lepers. This is a sign and good news for her. God willing, her problems that worry her will end, thank God. One of the unpleasant visions for a married woman is to see a leper in her home, because it indicates the presence of some family problems and her inability to understand her financial, social, and familial relationship with her husband. Among the most Good visions, which are good news for a married woman, that she stepped on a leper with her feet, is an indication of her ability to get rid of the worries that surround her, and God will give it to her. And He compensates her with His grace. Interpretation of a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees a stomach in her dream, this means that there are people trying to harm her and they are among the closest people she trusts. As for the interpretation of seeing a leper running away from her in a dream, this is a warning to pay attention to her emotional life in the near future. An unmarried woman who sees in her dream that she is killing a gecko, this is a sign of getting rid

title: Interpretation of lice in a dream

preview.html: It is one of the visions that carries many meanings and clues that depend on knowing the details of the dream, and this is what we will learn in the following lines from the gptafser.com/ website for men and women. Interpretation of seeing lice in a dream for one girl: He dreamed of lice in a dream about an unmarried girl, and he was eating on Her head, and she felt pain because of that. The vision is also a sign of the presence of enemies among the people closest to her in the family. Which makes her feel sad and disappointed, and God knows best. The appearance of white lice in an unmarried girl’s dream and spread on her head. It indicates that the dreamer is strong and has the ability To get rid of the enemy and solve the problems she faces, and God knows best. An unmarried girl dreams that her hair is full of lice. Her skin is considered good because she will get a lot of food and good things in her life. And if the unmarried girl sees a large louse, it has bitten her head badly, and she dreams That blood is bleeding from her. It indicates the presence of a person in her life who takes advantage of the goat in her title, and drains her of her purity, and God knows best. Seeing a large number of lice in a dream for an unmarried girl and killing her in a dream. Means that she is able to get rid of hypocrites and cheaters in her life. Seeing the elimination of Lice in an unmarried girl’s dream. It symbolizes that he is one step away from a lot of money that may be an inheritance, and God knows best. Or seeing lice spreading on the bed of an unmarried girl in a dream. It is considered a good combination for her that she will get married very soon. Seeing a small lice spreading On the head and hair of an unmarried girl in a dream. It is a metaphor for the mother’s suffering from envy, jealousy, and hatred in the souls of her family, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of seeing lice in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of seeing lice in a dream for a married woman. A married woman is sick when she sees lice in a dream and she is yellow in the dream. The vision indicates that her illness will become severe, and she will feel very tired, and God knows best. However, if we see lice emerging from the hair of a married woman and it was large in size in a dream, this is a vision worthy of praise for her and heralds the end of the illness and the enjoyment of a speedy recovery, God willing. The appearance of lice in large numbers and it was white. In a dream for a married woman. It symbolizes the stability of her married life and her intense love for him. It also means that she will obtain a lot of money in the coming period of her life, which will bring her benefit and comfort, and God knows best. A married woman sees a lot of lice coming out of the head of many of the women sitting with her in the room. The dream. A sure sign that these women gossip a lot about the fortune-teller. A married woman dreams of lice coming out of her hair, but she is in great pain in the dream. It indicates that in the future he will suffer from financial hardship, and that God Almighty is high. The appearance of lice in abundance on the head of a married woman and her stings on Her head in a dream. A sign of the great and successive judgments that the dreamer will go through, and God knows best. The interpretation of seeing lice in a dream about the man and its meaning. When a man dreams of seeing lice in a dream, and they were in large numbers. It means that he will be exposed to several financial crises in his life, and God knows best. Either the man will see

title: The 50 most accurate interpretations of dreaming of green lemons in a dream in detail

preview.html: What are the most important interpretations of dreaming about green lemons in a dream? Green lemons are one of the symbols that dreamers often see in their dreams. Sometimes in a dream it looks healthy and sometimes it is rotten. It was interpreted by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, and many contemporary jurists paid attention to it through a specialized Egyptian website. We will learn about the most important meanings of this vision in the following paragraphs. Interpretation of a dream about green lemons in a dream. Seeing green lemons in a dream for a young man indicates his success in his work and his obtaining a high position in it. This fruit In a student’s dream, it portends him great educational success, provided that it is healthy and not withered or rotten. Green lemons in a married man’s dream indicate a major professional promotion and reaching a prestigious position that he previously desired. The merchant who will see this dream will be granted success, may God grant him success and surpass all competitors working in the same business. Field. A person who complains about failure in his professional or emotional life will be blessed with success on both fronts and his life will change for the better after this dream. If an unemployed person sees that he is picking green lemons, he will soon work in a job that will bring him a lot of money. This fruit is A sign in the dream that the dreamer is a patient person who can bear difficulties with the utmost courage. A lemon in a dream is a positive sign that symbolizes the dreamer’s strength and perseverance in his position, and this persistence will lead him to success. Whoever dreams that he has a yellow lemon in his hand and its color is green, this is interpreted as illness. Then he will be cured. Perhaps the green lemon indicates fame for anyone who sought it and puts it first on his list of priorities. What is the interpretation of seeing an immature green lemon? The vision symbolizes some material obstacles that the dreamer will soon face. Perhaps an unfresh lemon in a woman’s dream indicates... Minor problems with the lover will subside. If a married woman sees this dream, she may quarrel with her husband and this dispute will be resolved soon. The vision can lead to some simple work problems that are easy to solve. This dream symbolizes that the dreamer is studying a project at the present time and soon he will implement it. On the ground. Commentators also said that the dream indicates an imminent pregnancy for a woman who wants to fulfill her mother’s desire. The vision may lead to educational difficulties for the dreaming student, but he will overcome them in time. What is the interpretation of a dream about a withered green lemon? The dream indicates the deterioration of the dreamer’s health, which He was about to recover, or a sudden illness will affect the healthy dreamer who was not previously suffering from illness. The scene shows a feeling of weakness, low energy and unwillingness to do more. The vision may indicate shocks that may make the dreamer weak, and his degree of resistance to these conditions must be strengthened in order to continue Living without obstacles. Sometimes a dream reflects the dreamer's negative view of himself, he hesitates and his self-confidence is very weak. There is a decline in the financial aspect of the dreamer that he will experience soon, and the dream here is above all a warning, and the dreamer must save his money especially after this dream, even Do not fall into the well of danger, debt and poverty. Strangest m
